name: Avoid Methods having a very low Comment/Code ratio (Go)
description:
Methods should have at least a ratio comment/code > X % (by default X=5)
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all Methods with comment/code ratio lower than X %
It provides the following information:
 Method full name, comment/code ratio
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Artifact
alternativeName: Enrich your code with comments to give an overview of the code to improve maintainability

parameters.name: Minimum % Comment / Code Ratio
parameters.description: Minimum % Comment / Code Ratio for functions, methods and events
